detailResultFields.value:
https://ece.ubc.ca/courses/cpen-elec-497/

If you are interested in this course, please register in the waiting list. Kindly contact your supervisor and send email to registration@ece.ubc.ca,we will register you accordingly, thanks.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
For registration assistance, please contact envrionmental.engineering@ubc.ca.
Registration in a studio section is required with the lecture. If the studio Section ENVE_V 401 T0A is full, register in ENVE_V 401 Section T0B.

Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
